original_title: 映画 ふたりはプリキュア Splash☆Star チクタク危機一髪！
overview: In the middle of a karaoke contest, Saki and Mai find that time has suddenly stopped. Following some spirits, they wind up in the Land of Clocks where they find Sirloin, a warrior from Dark Fall who is keeping the Infinite Clock hostage.  Naturally, Pretty Cure won't stand for this, and they begin to battle. But can they stop fighting with each other first?
title: Futari wa Precure Splash☆Star Tic-Tac Crisis Hanging by a Thin Thread!
